hm.binkley.util.function

Interface Defer<D extends RuntimeException>

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.util.function.Function<Exception,D>
    Functional Interface:
    This is a functional interface and can therefore be used as the assignment target for a lambda expression or method reference.

    @FunctionalInterface
public interface Defer<D extends RuntimeException>
extends java.util.function.Function<Exception,D>
    Defer evaluates deferred execution for throwing versions of types for Java 8 stream.
    Author:
    B. K. Oxley (binkley)
    Pending:
    Needs documentation., Package scope or public?
